CreditsÂ¶

LSQ has been implemented in following languages:

  • Python: lsqpy by Keegan Go
  • Julia: LSQ.jl by David Zeng and Karanveer Mohan
  • Matlab: lsq by Alex Lemon

All implementations of LSQ are released under the MIT license.

The design of LSQ was inspired by Steven Diamond’s CVXPY, a similar software packages for solving the much more general class of convex optimization problems.

A huge thanks to Stephen Boyd for his feedback in both the design and documentation of LSQ.
